list_definition.mean_english: khẩn cấp, đòi hỏi sự chú ý

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There is an urgent message for the doctor.

list_ex_of_english: Taking patient age distribution and medical advances into account, this will become a major medical problem of the twenty-first century; one that requires urgent attention.

The breadth of papers illustrated the urgent need to recognize the centrality of ethics in approaches to architecture, whether in practice, education or research.
Inevitably this is an urgent task and one of considerable significance.
There is an urgent need for a renewed discussion of form, and an urgent need to give words to our tacit knowledge.
Only in live performances, when the momentum begins to build and the voices become urgent, does it catch fire.
An urgent question, if we want to analyze causation in terms of the dependence of whether one event occurs on whether another event occurs.
The urgent need to improve health care quality.
